job.title: Web Developer
job.description: FocusKPI Inc is looking for a Web Developer Tagging Specialist to work for our client in Boston MA This is a fulltime contract positionbrbrstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliLeading communication between the web analytics and data engineering teams and efficiently managing pixeltag implementation requests within a tag manager TealiumIQliliUse browser web debugging tools to perform tag validation and QAliliPerform Tagging auditsdata integrity checks on a regular basis to have better control over the tags deployed across the sitesliliDocument and maintain a copy of tagging requests from the different teamsliliUse mobile proxy tools like CharlesFiddler to validate analytics tagging across mobile applications and mobile web taggingliliCollaborate with different vendors marketing social media affiliates etc to understand different analytics implementation techniques and suggest implementation best practices based on welldefined organization standards brbrliulstrongQualificationsbrstrongulli3 years of years of web developmentweb analytics implementation experienceliliExperienced in managing the backend tagging process and working with tag management tools Tealium Google Tag Manager DTMAdobe Launch Tealium experience is a plusliliStrong frontend HTML5 CSS Javascript amp jQuery experienceliliExperience working with browser debugging toolsUDO debugger network tools wasp etcliliExperience working with analytics tools such as Google analytics Adobe analyticsliliExperience working in an agile environment and with tools like JIRAbrliulThank youbrbrFocusKPI Hiring TeambrbrFounded in 2010 FocusKPI Inc FocusKPI is a data science and technology firm specializing in predictive analytics practice and methodologies FocusKPI is a US company headquartered in Silicon Valley California with an East Coast office in Boston MassachusettsbrbrPowered by JazzHRbrbrPKS0gKiRud
